channel.title: Whonix terminal server
channel.description: Okay so after I got through the process to do the user name and password what does the screen suppose to look like or do because it just keep repeating itself saying root@host:/home/user and I’ve went through that process already.

item.title: Whonix terminal server
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is expected. It’s called a shell prompt. You find more on that subject on search engines by searching for shell prompt. Pretty much the same for most Linux distributions. Unspecific to Whonix. Therefore ttps://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

Read full topic
